Original: There you are! We knew there would be
another in this line of requests!
[Page]
He believes this will be the last...
Both the Outland Count and I agree
that there are four marks.
[Page]
I need hardly tell you this, but you
should visit him at the Grand Court.
I shall await your swift return!
Translation: There you are! We knew there would be
another in this line of requests!
[Page]
He believes this will be the last...
Both the Outland Count and I agree
that there are four marks.
[Page]
I need hardly tell you this, but you
should visit him at the Grand Court.
I shall await your swift return!

Original: Welcome back. So the last mark was...
the wind mark? It is good that you
found it.
[Page]
The marks are all known... I wonder
who left them, and for what purpose.
[Page]
It seems you have flown all across
the Cloudy Stronghold in your quest.
Tharsis is in your debt.
[Page]
Perhaps the Outland Count anticipated
this outcome and posted the request
just for you... That was a joke.
Translation: Welcome back. So the last mark was...
the wind mark? It is good that you
found it.
[Page]
The marks are all known... I wonder
who left them, and for what purpose.
[Page]
It seems you have flown all across
the Cloudy Stronghold in your quest.
Tharsis is in your debt.
[Page]
Perhaps the Outland Count anticipated
this outcome and posted the request
just for you... That was a joke.

Original: Hm? Oh yes... the request. It is none
other than another mark. I trust I
needn't explain it to you.
[Page]
Let me start with assumptions. So far,
we have found water, fire, and earth
marks. What strikes you as missing?
[Page]
Exactly! Wind! If the marks represent
the four elements, there should be a
wind mark! Nay, there must be!
[Page]
Alas, we cannot always count on a
conveniently-unearthed document. We
have no clues. But will that stop me?
Translation: Hm? Oh yes... the request. It is none
other than another mark. I trust I
needn't explain it to you.
[Page]
Let me start with assumptions. So far,
we have found water, fire, and earth
marks. What strikes you as missing?
[Page]
Exactly! Wind! If the marks represent
the four elements, there should be a
wind mark! Nay, there must be!
[Page]
Alas, we cannot always count on a
conveniently-unearthed document. We
have no clues. But will that stop me?

Original: [Color:5]Will that stop him?[Color:0]
Translation: [Color:5]Will that stop him?[Color:0]

Original: Ha! I'm glad to have friends unafraid
to joke with me like this. But no!
I will never give up!
Translation: Ha! I'm glad to have friends unafraid
to joke with me like this. But no!
I will never give up!

Original: Of course, we know each other too
well by now for you to think I would
let anything stop me.
Translation: Of course, we know each other too
well by now for you to think I would
let anything stop me.

Original: Let us take the four elements as a
base assumption. We have found three.
Can you guess where the last may be?
[Page]
If you can figure it out, then report
to me, and I will send a team to
handle the investigation.
Translation: Let us take the four elements as a
base assumption. We have found three.
Can you guess where the last may be?
[Page]
If you can figure it out, then report
to me, and I will send a team to
handle the investigation.

Original: Have you deduced the location of the
fourth mark?
Translation: Have you deduced the location of the
fourth mark?

Original: [Color:5]Do you know where the 4th mark is?[Color:0]
Yes
No
I need more information
Translation: [Color:5]Do you know where the 4th mark is?[Color:0]
Yes
No
I need more information

Original: Ah, that is a good girl, Margherita.
You are the only one who understands
my frustration...
[Page]
When you came to me, I assumed you
needed to review the facts or else
you had the location for me.
[Page]
But neither is true. Margherita,
do you share this nebulous feeling
caused by such incomprehensibility?
[Page]
What are you doing, my friends?
Be quick and think of where the
sole remaining mark might be.
Translation: Ah, that is a good girl, Margherita.
You are the only one who understands
my frustration...
[Page]
When you came to me, I assumed you
needed to review the facts or else
you had the location for me.
[Page]
But neither is true. Margherita,
do you share this nebulous feeling
caused by such incomprehensibility?
[Page]
What are you doing, my friends?
Be quick and think of where the
sole remaining mark might be.

Original: Information... Hmm... Why don't we
review the locations of the marks
we have already found?
[Page]
The [Color:5]water mark[Color:0] was at [Color:5]A-4/5-1[Color:0].
The [Color:5]fire mark[Color:0] was at [Color:5]C-2/1-5[Color:0].
And the [Color:5]earth mark[Color:0] was at [Color:5]A-2/5-5[Color:0].
[Page]
Why not mark those spots on your map
and see how they are arranged as
a whole?
Translation: Information... Hmm... Why don't we
review the locations of the marks
we have already found?
[Page]
The [Color:5]water mark[Color:0] was at [Color:5]A-4/5-1[Color:0].
The [Color:5]fire mark[Color:0] was at [Color:5]C-2/1-5[Color:0].
And the [Color:5]earth mark[Color:0] was at [Color:5]A-2/5-5[Color:0].
[Page]
Why not mark those spots on your map
and see how they are arranged as
a whole?

Original: Ah, just what I hoped to hear! Then
tell me... Where do you believe the
fourth mark to be located?
Translation: Ah, just what I hoped to hear! Then
tell me... Where do you believe the
fourth mark to be located?

Original: Understood. I will dispatch my scouts
and see what the result is.
Translation: Understood. I will dispatch my scouts
and see what the result is.

Original: There was no mark where you thought
there might be... Look at the anguish
on poor Margherita's face...
[Page]
I understand that it is difficult to
take an accurate shot in the dark, but
this is important. Try a bit harder.
Translation: There was no mark where you thought
there might be... Look at the anguish
on poor Margherita's face...
[Page]
I understand that it is difficult to
take an accurate shot in the dark, but
this is important. Try a bit harder.

Original: They did, in fact, discover a new mark
at the location you deduced! What a
magnificent find!
[Page]
It seems safe to say, judging by the
design, that it is the wind mark.
Now all four marks are known...
[Page]
Yet even now, it remains a mystery
what their purpose is and why they
were created.
[Page]
Still, this request can be considered
complete. The reward is yours... go
and accept it with pride.
Translation: They did, in fact, discover a new mark
at the location you deduced! What a
magnificent find!
[Page]
It seems safe to say, judging by the
design, that it is the wind mark.
Now all four marks are known...
[Page]
Yet even now, it remains a mystery
what their purpose is and why they
were created.
[Page]
Still, this request can be considered
complete. The reward is yours... go
and accept it with pride.

Original: Hm? What is it? You want to pet
Margherita? Hahaha, I am afraid
that is impossible.
Translation: Hm? What is it? You want to pet
Margherita? Hahaha, I am afraid
that is impossible.

Original: In your search for the fourth mark,
you arrive at the location where you
believe it to be.
Translation: In your search for the fourth mark,
you arrive at the location where you
believe it to be.

Original: As you make a thorough survey of the
land, you find the wind mark... It is
just what you and the Count hoped for!
[Page]
All that remains is to remember its
location and report it to the Outland
Count.
Translation: As you make a thorough survey of the
land, you find the wind mark... It is
just what you and the Count hoped for!
[Page]
All that remains is to remember its
location and report it to the Outland
Count.

Original: You narrow your eyes and can make out
the [Color:5]wind mark[Color:0] engraved in the land...
Translation: You narrow your eyes and can make out
the [Color:5]wind mark[Color:0] engraved in the land...
